responses.response: Jessica Calderon is a skilled Full Stack Developer with an MBA in Technology Management. She's passionate about building secure, scalable applications and has experience with DoD contracting, STIG compliance, and cloud infrastructure. She holds a DoD Secret Clearance and is CompTIA Security+ certified. Currently, she's available for new opportunities and loves working on innovative tech projects! üöÄ

Jessica built this portfolio using React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. The tech stack includes modern frontend technologies with a retro MySpace-inspired design. The portfolio is deployed on GitHub Pages and showcases her skills in full-stack development, DevOps, and cloud technologies. She's also experienced with Docker, AWS ECS, GitLab CI/CD, PostgreSQL, and various other tools and frameworks! üíª

The STIG-Compliant Container Pipeline is one of Jessica's impressive case studies! It involves building a secure containerization pipeline using Iron Bank containers, GitLab CI/CD, and AWS ECS. This project focused on meeting DoD security requirements (STIG compliance) while maintaining efficient DevOps practices. It demonstrates her expertise in security, containerization, and cloud infrastructure. You can find more details in the Case Studies section of her portfolio! üîí

Jessica is passionate about building secure, scalable applications and working with modern technologies. She loves full-stack development, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps practices. She's particularly interested in AI, data visualization, and creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems. Her portfolio showcases her continuous learning journey and commitment to staying current with technology trends! ‚ú®
